      • notifyUri

        public void notifyUri(Uri uri,
                      ContentObserver observer)
        Ask the provider to notify an Uri. This method is useful for not notifying the same Uri a lot of times when we're in case of a batch. (It will delay all the uri changes notification at the end of the batch.)
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to notify
        observer - The observer that originated the change.
